Normally, this stacked unit would run you $2,699 at full price, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,999 over 2025 during sales. While it has dropped lower in past years, you’re still getting a solid $700 markdown here to the best rate that has been offered from the brand this year. items.summary:
Velotric has launched a Christmas e-bike flash sale that is only running through the weekend, giving you some holiday savings on three particular models. Of the offers, the standout is Velotric’s T1 ST Plus Lightweight Urban e-bike with a FREE range extender ($400 value) for $1,299 shipped. Returning from Black Friday, the e-bike would normally fetch $1,649 at full price and $2,049 with the range extender added, without the free inclusion. We saw this same bundle offered during the brand’s full November holiday event, with it coming back around for another chance at $750 in total savings at the best price of 2025. You can check out the other flash offers down below before they’re gone with the weekend.

We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops the new Xbox Ally handheld to $489.99 shipped. This is the base model from Microsoft’s latest portable Xbox lineup, which launched at $600 only a few months ago, and today’s $110 price cut marks the lowest price we’ve tracked for it to date. It comes in $10 under the previous all-time low we saw briefly at Best Buy during its Black Friday sale. It’s not often that a new, Xbox-branded gaming console sees such a steep discount this early, so you might want to jump on this offer if you’ve been eyeing a new handheld for the holidays. Amazon’s listing also includes 3 months of Game Pass Premium for free, making this an even better deal overall. Head below for more details.

items.title: EcoFlow’s latest 48-hour Xmas flash sale drops DELTA 3 Max + TRAIL 200 DC power stations to new $1,049 bundle low, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Christmas Holiday Sale, EcoFlow has launched the next of its seasonal 48-hour flash sales with up to 45% discounts across four varying offers that will run through December 13. One notable standout is the latest DELTA 3 Max Plus Portable Power Station with a FREE Trail 200 DC 60,000mAh power station ($200 value) at $1,049 shipped, which beats out its Amazon pricing by $50 (and that offer doesn’t include the free extra station either). We saw this same bundle offered as an early Black Friday flash deal at $1,099 from the station’s $1,899 MSRP, though at Amazon, it’s been regularly falling to $1,099 and even dropped as low as $1,044 the week of Black Friday, though again, there was no bonus station bundled with it. All-in-all, with the bundled TRAIL station, you’re getting $850 savings here ($1,050 considering the TRAIL’s $200 value) for the next two days, landing these two units down at the best price we have tracked. Head below to learn more and check out the three other flash offers while they’re still around.
